author: Staff Reporter
text: K. Darshini (6), a student of Yuvabharathi Public School, Kanuvai, has entered the India Book of Records and Asia Book of Records in speed skating in the under seven category, covering 10.5 kms in 41.03 minutes in the event titled “Quarter Skating Marathon” at the Cosmopolitan Club here, recently. The girl who has been practicing skating from LKG, and has won many medals in State and district level events.
title: Girl sets record
